Sortti-peräkärryn vuokrasopimus tehdään: The Sortti trailer rental contract is concluded either in connection with the online booking or at the Sortti station. We will check the identity of the renter at the station.
Vaihtoehtoiset tavat varata Sortti-peräk: Alternative ways to book a Sortti trailer:
Fill in the online booking form.
Make a rent at Sortti station's info.
Huomioithan, että kello 17 alkavissa var: Please note that for bookings starting at 17:00, the trailer must be collected from the Sortti station no later than 17:30.
Säännöt Sortti-peräkärryn vuokraukseen j: Rules for the rental and use of a Sortti trailer
Peräkärryn vuokraus maksaa 5 € kolmelta: Trailer rental costs €5 for three hours.
Peräkärry on tarkoitettu vain henkilöasi: The trailer is intended for transporting waste to Sortti stations for private customers only.
Yksi asiakas saa vuokrata peräkärryn vai: One customer may only rent a trailer for one three-hour shift per day.
Jos vuokra-aikasi ylittää kolme tuntia t: If your rental time exceeds three hours or if you do not bring the waste to the Sortti station in a trolley, you will be charged 40 euros.
Peräkärryä ei voi vuokrata Kivikon ja Äm: A trailer cannot be rented for transporting the soil sold at the Kivikko and Ämmässuo Sortti station.
Jos maksat paikan päällä, käy vahvistama: If you are paying on the spot, please confirm the start of your trailer rental at the Sortti station INFO by showing your ID. Our staff will show you where to pick up the trolley at the station.
Perimme jätteiden vastaanotosta Sortti-a: We charge a fee for the collection of waste in accordance with the Sorting Stations' price list. The rent can be paid at INFO when the load is brought in.
ma, ke ja pe klo 8.30–15.30: Mon, Wed and Fri from 8.30 a.m. to 3.30 p.m.
Olen lukenut ja ymmärtänyt säännöt: I have read and understood the rules
Oletko varma, että haluat peruuttaa vara: Are you sure you want to cancel your rent?
Valitse vähintään yksi asema ennen kuin: Select at least one station before proceeding.
Valitse tuote, ajankohta ja asema ennen: Choose your product, time and position before proceeding.
Kirjoita sähköposti muodossa nimi@esimer: Please enter your email address in the format name@example.com
Peräkärryn vuokrauksen sopimusehdot: Terms and conditions for trailer rental
tos_info_paragraph_1: HSY has hired out the trailer to the customer for the purpose of transporting waste to the Sortti station. The trailer may only be used by the customer on the customer’s own account, and the customer must not hand over the trailer or transfer this agreement to a third party. The customer must use the trailer with care and return the trailer in the same condition as it was when it was hired. The customer must take into account the carrying capacity of the trailer and the binding of the load so that any shifting load does not damage the trailer.
tos_info_paragraph_2: The customer must have the appropriate driving licence for driving a combination of vehicles. The customer is liable for ensuring compliance with the regulations, including parking regulations, which apply to the hired trailer and its use. The customer is liable for any administrative fixed penalties, parking tickets and fines or overload fines that the customer receives while using the hired trailer.
tos_info_paragraph_3: The customer is liable to compensate for any damage caused by intentional or neglectful handling, overload, inadequate load binding or any similar reason or for exceeding the hire period. If the trailer is destroyed or lost during the hire period, the customer is liable to compensate for it up to its replacement value. If the trailer is seriously damaged, lost or involved in an accident, notify HSY immediately.
tos_info_paragraph_4: HSY has insured the trailer with a vehicle insurance policy. In case of accidents, the customer’s responsibility is €350.
tos_info_paragraph_5: The hire period of the trailer is three hours. The trailer is handed over to the customer at a HSY office. Unless agreed otherwise, the trailer must be returned to the same office at the end of the hire period.
tos_info_paragraph_6: If the hired trailer is returned later than agreed or used for any purpose other than transporting waste to the Sortti station, HSY has the right to charge a late fee of €40 per day or part thereof.
Vuokralleantaja vuokraa vuokralleottajal: The Lessor shall lease to the Lessee the next hire item on the following terms and conditions.
Jos peräkärryllä ei tuoda jätettä Sortti: If the trailer does not bring the waste to the Sortti station or the trailer is returned late, the price is €40.
Edellä ilmoitettujen ehtojen lisäksi ova: In addition to the terms and conditions set out above, the attached General Terms and Conditions apply.
Jos kärry hajoaa vuokrauksen aikana, ota: If the trolley breaks down during the rental, please contact us
ma-pe kello 8.30-15.30 HSY:n asiakaspalv: Mon-Fri from 8.30 a.m. to 3.30 p.m. HSY customer service
ma-pe kello 15.30-21.00, la-su kello 10-: Mon-Fri from 3.30 p.m. to 21.00 p.m., Sat-Sun from 10.00 a.m. 6.00 p.m. emergency number
confirm_info_paragraph_1: External dimensions: length 418 cm, width 167 cm Luggage compartment dimensions: volume 5 m3 length 265 cm, width 125 cm height 50 cm, height with canopy 150 cm Trailer tare weight 195 kg Load capacity 555 kg Total weight 750 kg The trailer has neither brakes nor winter tyres.
confirm_info_paragraph_2: Confirm your trailer rental at the Sortti station INFO by showing your ID. Our staff will show you where to pick up the trolley at the station..
pay_on_site_modal_paragraph: We charge a fee for the collection of waste in accordance with the Sorting Stations' price list. Only <1>payment card.</1> is accepted as a means of payment for the trailer rental. The rent is paid <2>in the INFO</2> when the load is brought in.
Vahvistan, että haluan maksaa varauksen: I confirm that I wish to pay for the reservation on the spot.
Lähetimme sähköpostiisi ohjeet ja varaus: We will send you instructions and a booking confirmation by email.
late_cancel_warning_paragraph: The product must be at the Sortti-station! Late returns will be charged a <1>€40</1> late fee according to the terms of the contract.
Varauksen peruutus ei onnistu, jos vuokr: Cancellation is not possible if there are 24 hours or less until the rental starts.
Vedenjakelun vikapäivystys ja automaatti: Water supply emergency hotline and automatic notifications in case of disruptions: tel. 09 1561 3000, available 24/7.
Jos peräkärry menee rikki tai joudut kol: If your trailer breaks down or you get into an accident, call customer services.
Peräkärry on nyt palautettu!: The trailer has now been returned!
